title: Ticket #3844: Replacement tests using new techniques - run in parallel for a time
description:
We have many improved tools which make tests simpler to write and more understandable to read. If they have a ticket, they are active. The following are being considered:

Negotiator Tessts

  1. cmd_status_shows-negotiator.run
  2. job_hgq_negfail_basic_van.run
  3. job_negotiator_restart.run
  4. job_services_during_neg_cycle.run (Recent)
  5. negotiator_match_log_exists.run (Recent)
  6. lib_auth_protocol-negot.run
  7. lib_auth_protocol-negot-prt2.run
  8. lib_auth_protocol-negot-prt3.run

Tests which configure their own submit files from templates

  1. cmd_chirp_get-set_par.template
  2. cmd_q_multi.templatejob_core_chirp_par.t
  3. job_core_basic_par.template
  4. job_core_chirp_par.template

  16. job_schedd_restart-holdjobs-ok.template
  17. job_schedd_restart-runningjobs-ok.template
